messages.message:
fyi in case other people run into this, i saw a lot of failed login attempts in CI runs - see the high number of failures for these PRs
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/58645 - @Liam Callanan 
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/57736 - @Liam Callanan 
    ◦ the rerun after I deleted the PR sandbox ran into some flaky failures, but no more login issues
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/58601 - @Travis 
    ◦ deleting the PR sandbox and triggering a rerun fixed the issue! :tada: 
i’m able to log in as <mailto:hoangpaul+pikachu@instabase.com|hoangpaul+pikachu@instabase.com> manually though - any thoughts on how this might happen? other CI runs are now able to log in successfully, so maybe this has to do with sandboxes that exist before and after a crafting-aihub deployment?
Seeing lots of `ESOCKETTIMEDOUT` issues in the linked runs. Which test run has log-in issue?
oh i don’t think there’s a bug we need to look into here since logging in manually works and logins in other CI runs work
What time were the issues? I was struggling to do anything for about 20 minutes in all crafting sandboxes at ~3:30pm eastern
ah yes, these were all run around that time @Arjun
yeah I’m not sure why this happened because it didn’t seem like there was a deployment going on
but I saw a similar issue around a similar time yesterday as well :patrick-shrug:
i'm trying to find which test has log in issues so I can look further
I don’t think it’s an issue with any specific test @Xindi Xu, I think the crafting cluster itself was having issues
I have to admit, I skipped the test.
there were a lot of failures in your CI run - are you talking about skipping `advanced-apps`?
let’s start a new thread to discuss `advanced-apps` since i’ve seen it fail a lot across ci, aihub-sandbox, and aihub-uat
